Data Fields
spi_attr_t Struct Reference
Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) Master

SPI Attribute Data Structure. More...

#include <spi.h>

Collaboration diagram for spi_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for opening or reconfiguring the SPI port.

Data Fields

uint8_t pin_assign
 The GPIO configuration to use (see LPC17xx Devices)
 
uint32_t bitrate
 The SPI bitrate.
 
uint8_t mode
 The SPI mode from 0 to 3 inclusive (CPOL:CPHA or SPI_ATTR_MODE0 to SPI_ATTR_MODE3)
 
uint8_t master
 Must be set to master (SPI_ATTR_MASTER)
 
uint8_t width
 The transfer width.
 
uint8_t format
 The SPI output format (SPI_ATTR_FORMAT_SPI, SPI_ATTR_FORMAT_TI or SPI_ATTR_FORMAT_MICROWIRE)
